items.ja: Last-minute Wilson goal leaves fans booing Frank's Spurs
items.en: Last-minute Wilson goal leaves fans booing Frank's Spurs
items.text_for_match: Last-minute Wilson goal leaves fans booing Frank's Spurs A last-minute Callum Wilson goal gives West Ham an important three points and increases the pressure on Tottenham boss Thomas Frank. items.ja: Chelsea beat Brentford for Rosenior's first Premier League win

items.text_for_match: Chelsea beat Brentford for Rosenior's first Premier League win Cole Palmer scored a penalty to secure the a for Chelsea against Brentford and give Liam Rosenior his first Premier League win as manager. items.ja: Newcastle lacked 'cutting edge' in draw against Wolves - Howe
items.en: Newcastle lacked 'cutting edge' in draw against Wolves - Howe
items.text_for_match: Newcastle lacked 'cutting edge' in draw against Wolves - Howe Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe says his side controlled the game but were unable to find a "moment of magic" to score in their goalless draw against Wolves in the Premier League. items.ja: Club offers help to fans with mental health issues

items.ja: 'I'll be surprised if he's here next game' - Shearer on Glasner
items.en: 'I'll be surprised if he's here next game' - Shearer on Glasner
items.text_for_match: 'I'll be surprised if he's here next game' - Shearer on Glasner Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer expects Oliver Glasner to leave Crystal Palace in the coming week, after his outburst against the board in the wake of their defeat by Sunderland. items.ja: How Carrick's Man Utd dismantled Man City

items.text_for_match: How Carrick's Man Utd dismantled Man City Match of the Day pundits Alan Shearer and Wayne Rooney break down how Manchester United's shape frustrated Manchester City in Michael Carrick's first game as interim manager. items.ja: Arsenal stumble in draw against resilient Forest
items.en: Arsenal stumble in draw against resilient Forest
items.text_for_match: Arsenal stumble in draw against resilient Forest Arsenal missed the chance to extend their lead at the top of the Premier League table to nine points, with a goalless draw against a determined Nottingham Forest. items.ja: Crystal Palace 'abandoned' by board - Glasner
items.en: Crystal Palace 'abandoned' by board - Glasner
items.text_for_match: Crystal Palace 'abandoned' by board - Glasner Crystal Palace boss Oliver Glasner is left frustrated after his side's defeat by Sunderland, saying the club's board have "abandoned'" them and he can no longer stay quiet because he wants to "defend his players". items.ja: Man Utd players 'really care' - Carrick on derby heroics
items.en: Man Utd players 'really care' - Carrick on derby heroics
items.text_for_match: Man Utd players 'really care' - Carrick on derby heroics Manchester United boss Michael Carrick praises the attitude his players have shown since taking over, following his side's 2-0 derby victory against Manchester City in the Premier League.
